content.question: The Black Power movement of the late 1960s advocated that African Americans

choices.label: organize political parties sympathetic to communism
establish African American communities in Africa
seek the racial integration of northeastern cities
establish control of their political and economic life

content.answer: establish control of their political and economic life

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
